channel.title: Half-Life 1 Beta coverage...
channel.description:
Does anyone know any good websites that cover the HL1 Beta development? I already know about the one on Facepunch, [url]https://www.facepunch.com/showthread.php?t=134245[/url]
Anyone know about other sites, especially with screenshots.

item.title: Half-Life 1 Beta coverage...
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
Has this thing ever been leaked to the public? Or are these screenshots from demo builds given out to the press?

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life 1 Beta coverage...
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
I probably couldn’t tell you anything more than you already know. I was never able to gather much info on the HL1 beta myself. Unfortunately it’s all probably been lost to time, I’d be surprised if Valve themselves has the original stuff yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life 1 Beta coverage...
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
I already read everything on the Combine wiki, it’s a great source of information. But I was kinda hoping there’d be some more sites with even more info.

And I have the HL2 beta (including WC mappack) myself

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life 1 Beta coverage...
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Go to the Combine Overwiki. Also, talk to Klow there, he’s CRAZY about the HL2 beta.

Read full topic
